hero.title: The best way to manage your dropshipping business.
hero.subTitle: Focus on what matters to you. Finway automates Product Import and Order Placement from any supplier.

features.title: Focus on marketing.
features.subTitle: Reduce errors, save time and money with Finway.

feat.title: Import products & inventory from any supplier.
feat.subTitle: Does your supplier have thousands of products with changing inventory? No problem. Finway refreshes the full product and inventory feed daily.

feat.title: Automatic order placement & tracking data
feat.subTitle: Finway places all orders from your store at your supplier. When your suppliers ships the product, we make sure your store (and customer) is in the loop with full track and trace and backorder support.

centerCard.title: Automate your dropshipping business.
centerCard.subTitle: Finway imports the product and stock feeds from any supplier, and places all your orders directly at your supplier. Depending on supplier availability, we support fully fledged API connections, or automated emails (yes, our software can read emails) for those that don't.

compatibility.title: Compatibility
compatibility.subTitle: This is what we support right now. Out of the box. Need a different supplier or store connection?

steps.title: Connect your accounts.
steps.subTitle: Choose from a wide range of supported platforms, or connect via API to get up and running in minutes.

steps.title: Set it up once, then forget about it.
steps.subTitle: Finway automatically syncs every order and invoice across your platforms so you can focus on growing your business instead of chasing paperwork around the office or home desktops.

steps.title: Profit!
steps.subTitle: You'll spend less time doing paperwork - more time growing sales, creating new products, innovating customer service or whatever else gets you excited about being an entrepreneur!

pricing.title: Free yourself from time-consuming tasks.
pricing.subTitle: Finway automates tedious accounting and e-commerce workflows so you can focus on the most important thing - your business. Try it for free with our 30-day trial offer.

cards.title: Start
features: Automatically sync webshop order with your accounting software as invoices
Shipping Fee's based on webshop order data

cards.title: Pro
features: Automatically sync webshop order with your accounting software as invoices
Shipping Fee's based on webshop order data
Realtime insight into supplier stock (intake required)

cards.title: Business
features: Automatically sync webshop order with your accounting software as invoices
Shipping Fee's based on webshop order data
Realtime insight into supplier stock (intake required)
Purchase orders at your supplier directly from Finway
Dropship your orders to your customers
Smart email parser to read supplier emails and find Track & Trace links or delivered items

footer.title: Subscribe for updates
footer.subTitle: Auto sync all orders and invoices from any e-commerce and accounting platform in one click. Let software do the work.
